item.title: The Little Bunny-Rabbit
item.description: A story of a neighbor girl who pretends to be a bunny-rabbit, and the man who fancies to her. This is the fourth story in my 'little animal' series, which began with 'The Little Kitty-Cat,' then 'The Little Puppy-Dog' and 'The Little Monkey.' As with all the stories, this story can be read by itself or you can work your way from the beginning to get a better idea of the progression of their relationship. And once, again, if you have ideas for other animals you'd like to see in this series, post them and I'll try my best--the ideas are coming in fast and furious now!
